author: Brett Besa
comment: Icon could be a bit bigger. Maybe use the profile picture as a background (á la hangouts messaging). I like it but the ui could use some work. Transitions are really nice though.
title: Not bad!

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content:
We still work on notifications we have a good plan about that. By the way if you get annoyed please follow this path Settings -> Application Manager -> Twitter for Wear  and turn notifications off on your device. 

Thanks for your review.

author: David Heath
comment: Unfortunately the retweet button won't work. You should change the font to something taller like the system font.  Otherwise very beautiful wear app.
title: Nice app

author: Rich Beach
comment: Won't even open. Want my money back. Get Network Error every time. Uninstalled and reinstalled etc

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content: If you can explain your problems with details we will glad to help you. Please email us help@towerlabs.co

author: Corey Holmes
comment: *where is the new notification feature?*   Great just needs a card or notification for new tweets instead of having to start the app each time on the watch to see the timeline

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content:
We work hard to implement new features as your mention. 

Thank you for review.

author: Jay S Brindle
comment: It needs reply and new tweet options.
title: Really nice app but...

author: Jason Priest
comment: I've been looking for an RSS reader for news, but couldn't find a decent one. But follow BBC, I get headlines and updates from my friends on one app! I love how this app shows full messages, a huge list from my timeline. Its perfect.

author: Alex Stewart
comment: This is definitely one of the best twitter apps for android wear and could be the best. The only thing holding this app back is not being able to make a tweet. This is definitely the smoothest running android wear twitter app and it looks great. Hope to see more added.

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content: Thanks for review. We will add more featues.

title: Amazing twitter app on Android Wear

author: Wade Sykora
comment: I would love to have a card pop up for new tweets. There would have to be options for it though, I'm sure some wouldn't want the alerts, it would also be cool to have a filter, only show tweets at you or from people you follow or both.

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content:
It is a great idea to think about it. On the other hand we think about the Twitter List view so you can see your particular list tweets. More features will coming. 

Thanks for review.

title: Works as intended.

author: Matt Toledo
comment: It just needs picture support and the option to open profiles and open links in a browser on a phone
title: Perfect

author: Aaron Bernas
comment: Tweeting via voice would be awesome
title: Great but

author: André Corbeil
comment: Paid for this app and I kept getting ads on my Moto 360. Bad form to take payment and force ads.

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content:
Hi, we don't have any ad services so it is impossible to you see an add. By the way, if you can contact with us we will glad to help you. 

help@towerlabs.co

title: Ads on paid version

author: Paul Graham
comment: Froze up repeatedly trying to log in.
title: Just didn't work

reply.author: Tower Labs
reply.content: We fixed the slowness problem(for some devices) with the new update.

author: Davut Ucar
comment: I like it also it is very useful.
title: It is great!!
